attributes.action: guarantee that no more banks will be nationalised using taxpayers' money unless the presiding Chief Executive(s) are brought to justice.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Taxpayers are being asked to foot the bill of bankers' excessive greed, with those ultimately responsible (Chief Executives of these firms e.g. Adam Applegarth), receiving huge golden parachutes for their incompetence. This situation must be changed or there will be no justice for society and nothing to prevent the return of this behaviour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
